Sql.CDATA: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'PMRegister' AND COLUMN_NAME = N'UsrIsReassignment') BEGIN ALTER TABLE dbo.PMRegister ADD UsrIsReassignment bit NOT NULL DEFAULT(0) PRINT 'Column PMRegister.UsrIsReassignment created' END
